name: Levi's Sherpa Vest - Vintage 1980s - Refashioned by Wild Together
description:
A WILD TOGETHER FAVORITE !

This was LEVI'S denim jacket, 1980s-1990s, sherpa lined - with sleeves.
Refashioned into a biker vest. A rad classic for the autumn/winter season.

- Snap button closures, 2 front chest pockets, adjustable snap cinch straps at back waist
- Worn-distressed at front snaps and bottom edges (See photos)
- Jacket has beautiful worn-distressed denim character
- Great gift for your biker boyfriend, brother, or dad

MEASUREMENTS
Size On Tag: Illegible - Fits like men's modern Large (See measurements)
Length: 24"
Pit to Pit: 22"
Shoulder to Shoulder: 19"
Label: Levi Strauss & Co. - Red Label, Little "E"
Condition: Excellent Vintage Condition

wildtogether.blogspot.com

>>>>> Thank you for shopping WT ! Please refer to my shop policies before ordering.
